name: SBaGen Binaural Beat File
summary: Learn about .SBG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: By playing back slightly different frequency sounds to each ear, binaural beats attempt to simulate a beating effect in the brain.

description: Audio file created by SBaGen, a program used to create binaural beats; contains a stereo audio file recorded using binaural techniques; used to simulate a mood or feeling when played back with stereo headphones.
